doc:
Michael Wildman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Wildman 0 Michael Wildman is a British actor who appeared in the film Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix. He played the role of aggressive, feisty centaur Magorian, who plays a small part in the eventual outcome of the plot. Prior to accepting this role, Michael was in the West End playing Lance Corporal Dawson in A Few Good Men alongside Rob Lowe and other programmes, most notably in Episode 5 of the British sitcom Extras alongside Samuel L. Jackson and in the part of the first Marc MacKenzie in Family Affairs. Michael_Wildman is a_British_actor who appeared in the_film_Harry_Potter and the_Order of the_Phoenix . He played the_role of aggressive_,_feisty_centaur_Magorian , who plays a_small_part in the_eventual_outcome of the_plot . Prior to accepting this_role , Michael was in the_West_End playing Lance_Corporal_Dawson in A_Few_Good_Men alongside Rob_Lowe and other_programmes , most_notably in Episode_5 of the_British_sitcom_Extras alongside Samuel_L._Jackson and in the_part of the_first_Marc_MacKenzie in Family_Affairs .
